Funding Specialists, Financial Consultant

Many ask are we a broker or a lender.  Best Connect has financial consultants, and funding specialists at your service to find the best program for your company.  We’ll go to bat for you along the way to assure the best possible rates you may qualify for.  From then on the file will be secured with Best Connect and the customer is kept up to date with renewals, and new things that pop up like funders we can connect you to.

What We Do Different

We have many different funding options for all types of small- large companies. Customer service is #1 priority, and our knowledge and transparency will make it easy for you to get funded, comfortably.  

Referrals

If you are an Independent-Sales-Operator and you have deals you’re looking to get funded, feel free to send them this way! Ask about our ISO relations program! If you are a business owner referring a business to Best Connect, receive up to $450.00 for the referral.
